nodes.text: Kaibe was a male Chiss slicer who lived during the Galactic Civil War. He worked for the pirate warlord Nym in Nym's Stronghold on Lok.
His torso had been replaced with cybernetics.

When the rogue assassin droid IG-88 took control of Nym's Factory Compound to create droids for his Droid Revolution, Nym enlisted the help of a skilled spacer to stop the droid's plans and remove him from the factory. Nym sent the spacer to Kaibe who had already come up with a plan.

Kaibe sent the spacer to the Bothan siblings Galody and Tupit who had already scouted out the compound of Tao-Ni Security on Endor, the company responsible for the factory's security. When the spacer later returned successfully with the needed parts, Kaibe was able to remotely hack into the factory compound's security system. He added the spacer's retinal scans to the system, so the retinal scanners of the factory would allow the spacer and his comrades to enter.

Kaibe is a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, where he can be found next to the cantina in Nym's Stronghold. He is part of the quest that gives players access to the IG-88 Heroic encounter instance. After talking to Nym's Envoy, the player is sent to Kaibe, who in turn sends the player to Endor to solve missions for Galody and Tupit. After returning to Lok and talking to Kaibe, the player can access the instance.
